mapper.sql: select user_no, email, name, introduce from user
mapper.insert: insert into user (email, name, password, tel, major, introduce, profile_photo, login_method) values(#{email}, #{name}, password(#{password}), #{tel}, #{major}, #{introduce}, #{profilePhoto}, #{loginMethod} )
mapper.select: select user_no, email, name, tel, major, introduce, profile_photo, login_method, create_date from user where user_no=#{no}
select user_no, email, name, tel, major, introduce, profile_photo, login_method, create_date user join class_member on user.user_no = class_member.user_no from user where class_no=#{no}
select * from user where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
